scripts.start-server: cd server; rimraf dist; cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx nest start --watch
scripts.start-server:stage: cd server && npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=stage npm run start:prod
scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server/auth && npm install" "cd server/menu && npm install" "cd server/plan && npm install" "cd server/docs && npm install" "cd server/file && npm install" "cd server/notification && npm install"
scripts.start:stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=stage concurrently --raw -n CLIENT,SERVER -c cyan,green "npm run start-client:stage" "npm run start-server:stage"
